00139     def onColorPick(self, event):
00140         '''
00141         Pick color scheme for the widgets to be evolved.
00142         '''
00143 
00144         colorDialog = wx.ColourDialog(self)
00145 
00146         if colorDialog.ShowModal() == wx.ID_OK:
00147             data = colorDialog.GetColourData()
00148             # color tuple
00149             colorScheme = data.GetColour().Get()
00150 
00151         colorDialog.Destroy()
00152

00154     def onOpenGAState(self, event):
00155         '''
00156         Open GA state file dialog.
00157         '''
00158         dirname = ''
00159         dlg = wx.FileDialog(self, "GA State Load File", dirname, "", 'GA files (.ga)|*.ga|All files (*)|*', wx.OPEN)
00160 
00161         if dlg.ShowModal() == wx.ID_OK:
00162             path = dlg.GetPath()
00163             self.controlServer.loadGAState(path)
00164 
00165         dlg.Destroy()
00166 
00167 #-------------------------------------------#
00168     def onSaveGAState(self, event):
00169         '''
00170         Save GA state file dialog.
00171         '''
00172         dirname = ''
00173         dlg = wx.FileDialog(self, "GA State Load File", dirname, "", 'GA files (.ga)|*.ga|All files (*)|*', wx.SAVE)
00174 
00175         if dlg.ShowModal() == wx.ID_OK:
00176             path = dlg.GetPath()
00177             self.controlServer.saveGAState(path)
00178             
00179         dlg.Destroy()

00183         '''
00184         About application dialog.
